content.text: What are your interests?
I love music, I read a lot, and I like to travel. What about you?
My favorite band is VNV Nation, and I love to listen to music on my tablet.
That's cool! I've heard of them but I haven't listened to them much. What are your favorite songs by them?
My favorite songs are "Standing" and "Illusion". I love the music and the lyrics.
Cool, I'll check them out! Do you like any other bands?
I also like Nine Inch Nails, Joy Division, and Depeche Mode.
Nice! I like NIN and Joy Division too. I've never heard of Depeche Mode.
They're a British band that was really popular in the 80s. You should check them out!
Ok, I will! What do you like to read?
I like to read science fiction and fantasy novels.
Cool! I like to read those too. I've been reading a lot of Stephen King lately.
I love Stephen King! He's one of my favorite authors.
Yeah, he's great! I've read a lot of his books. What's your favorite one?
My favorite one is "The Stand". It's a really long book, but it's so good.
I've heard good things about that one. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great read.
Ok, I will! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love reading.
Me too!
